extension.name: Content Tokens
extension.description: Provide mail merge tokens that list various content, ie Drupal nodes
extension.comments: This extension checks if its running under Drupal before attempting to do Drupal-specific things. It has been tested with Drupal 6 and 7. Its safe to install under Joomla, WordPress, and stand-alone. However no useful functionality is provided for WordPress, Joomla or stand-alone.
